content: this headband takes only 1 skein of ella rae s fabulous new lush yarn and knits up very quickly grab your favorite colorway or several and size 11 needles just 1-2 hours of knitting will get you an incredibly warm and cozy ear warmer not even the strongest winds will cut through this knit don t forget to add this pattern and minuet knit designs to your favorites **size** one size though even a confident beginner could adjust the length an width by adding row or casting on more stitches just bear in mind more yarn may be needed **gauge** 11 sts & 16 row to 4 inches/10cm round 1 k all sts round 2 *k1 p1* **yarn** 1 skein of ella rae lush **needles/notions** - 1 skein of ella rae lush or approx 50 yards/46 meters of super bulky yarn - size us 11/8mm 16 circular needle - darning needle - 1 stitch marker or a few if you tend to lose them
